hopobject.name: Lapdock
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_8_2) AppleWebKit/537.31 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/26.0.1410.65 Safari/537.31
hopobject.body:
A single special cable can repurpose a Motorola Atrix Phone Lapdock to create a complete BeagleBone Black computer that boots from Linux Angstrom included in the stock BeagleBone eMMC storage.
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/kLBjGNDlgvE" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
hopobject.shortdesc: Motorola Atrix Phone Lapdock can be used as display, keyboard, mouse, and rechargeable battery power for a complete BeagleBone Black computer.
